text: allahanalli mattu paralokadalli nambike iruvavaru allah mattu avana dutara satrugalondige sneha belesuvudannu nivendu kanalariri â€“ avaru, tam'ma hettavaru athava tam'ma putraru athava tam'ma sahodararu athava tam'ma bandhugalagiddaru sariye. Allahanu avara manas'sugalalli visvasada mudreyotti bittiruvanu mattu avanu tanna kadeyinda visesa caitan'yavannodagisi avarige neravagiruvanu. Mattu avanu avarannu, taladalli nadigalu hariyuvantaha svarga totagalolage serisuvanu. Avaru avugalalli sadakala iruvaru. Allahanu avarinda santustanagiruvanu mattu avaru avaninda santustaragiruvaru. Avare allahana balagadavaru. Nimage tilidirali, allahana balagadavare vijayigalaguvaru
